meanings.sent1: The puggish dog had a wrinkled face like a pug.
meanings.sent2: She adopted a puggish puppy from the shelter.
meanings.sent3: The puggish dog snored loudly, just like a pug.
meanings.sent4: Her puggish expression mirrored that of a content pug.
meanings.sent5: The puggish features of the dog made it instantly recognizable.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a pug.
meanings.sent1: His puggish loyalty was evident in how he followed her everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The puggish nature of the breed made them great companions.
meanings.sent3: She chuckled at the puggish way he tilted his head in confusion.
meanings.sent4: The old man's puggish determination to finish the puzzle was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The puggish charm of the pug won over even the toughest critics.

meanings.definition: Showing the behavior of a pug.
meanings.sent1: The puggish dog happily wagged its tail at every visitor.
meanings.sent2: Her puggish excitement was contagious, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The puggish way he snuggled up on the couch melted her heart.
meanings.sent4: His puggish stubbornness made training him a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The child's puggish playfulness brightened up the room.
